info.title: Melde API
info.description:
API for reporting and handling dialog related to adverse incidents.

Usage examples can be found in our example repository

post.summary: Validate an adverse indicent. This endpoint supports multiple report areas in the same report (combined reporting).
post.description: Requires authentication via HelseId and a valid HPR authorization

400.description: Bad request, most probably a validation error

post.summary: Report an adverse indicent. This endpoint supports multiple report areas in the same report (combined reporting).
post.description: Requires authentication via HelseId and a valid HPR authorization

post.summary: Create a new dialog for the specified report, report area and authenticated process handler.

requestBody.description: Information specifying report reference and report area to associate the dialog with

403.description: Authorization failed. Check for valid scopes in access token

400.description: Dialog already exists, request error or validation error

requestBody.description: Information needed to send a message

403.description: Authorization failed. Check for valid scopes in access token

400.description: Dialog already exists, request error or validation error

get.summary: Get dialog reference for specified report and authenticated user.

403.description: Authorization failed. Check for valid scopes in access token

get.summary: Get all unread messages in specified dialog

403.description: Authorization failed. Check for valid scopes in access token

post.summary: Oppretter en ny tilbakemelding og varsler via epost

400.description: Feil i meldingen, for eksempel påkrevde felt mangler

401.description: Autorisasjon feilet. Sjekk at det er gyldig bearer token i header Authorization

get.summary: Lookup one or more Nokup codes

401.description: Authorization failed, check for valid scopes in the access token

400.description: Bad request, most probably a validation error

ExternalCaseId.description: Unique report identifier in the external system.

IncidentDate.description: Incident date. Required for report area Medical equipment

DateText.description: Date period if no other date is given and DateUnknown is false

Nin.description:
National is number.
Required for report area Drug side effects if date of birth and gender is not set.
Required for report area Serious incident if name, gender, date of birth and nationality is not set

DateOfBirth.description:
Date of birth.
Required for report areas Drug side effects and Serious incident if Nin is not set

YearOfBirth.description:
Year of birth.
Required for report areas Cosmetics and Dietary supplements

Name.description:
Name.
Required for report area Serious incident if Nin is not set

Nationality.description:
Nationality.
Required for report area Serious incident if Nin is not set

SeriousIncident.description: True if a Serious incident report is included in this request

DrugSideEffects.description: True if a Drug side effects report is included in this request

Biovigilance.description: True if a Biovigilance report is included in this request

Cosmetics.description: True if a Cosmetics report is included in this request

DietarySupplements.description: True if a Dietary supplements report is included in this request

MedicalEquipment.description: True if a Medical equipment report is included in this request

ECigarette.description: True if an E-Cigarette report is included in this request

Radiation.description: True if a Radiation report is included in this request

Phone.description:
Phone number.
Required for report areas Serious incident, Cosmetics, Diatary supplements, Drug side effects and medical equipments

Position.description: Position. Required for report area Serious incident

ContributingFactors.description:
Medvirkende faktorer (kode 3.x...). Obligatorisk
Returnerer en liste med valgte koder.

ActualConsequenceForPatient.description: Faktisk konsekvens for pasient kode (5.x...). Obligatorisk

PossibleConsequenceOnRepetition.description: Mulig konsekvens ved gjentakelse kode (7.x...). Obligatorisk

BodyLocations.description: Where on the body is the product used

UsageDuration.description: For how long was the product used

ConditionOfSkinAreaBeforeUse.description: Condition of affected skin area before use of the products

ConditionOfSkinAreaBeforeUseDescription.description: Condition of affected skin area before use of the products

AffectedSkinAreas.description:
Affected skin areas
Where on the body showed side effects?

AmountOfIngredientsInDailyDose.description: Amount of ingredients per daily dose

UsageDuration.description: For how long was the product used

DrugsTakenAtSameTime.description: Which drugs. Required if AnyDrugsTakenAtSameTime is yes.

ReactionDelay.description:
Reaction delay.
How long after the use did the reactions show up?

SideEffectsOnPreviousUseDescription.description: Side effects on previous use description

AnyAllergiesOrInfluencingIssuesDescripti.description:
Any allergies or influencing issues description.
Required when AnyAllergiesOrInfluencingIssues is Yes

StartDate.description: Dosage start date. At least year must be specified.

StartTimeOfDay.description: Time of day when the patient started using the drug.

EndDate.description: Dosage end date. At least year must be specified.

AdministrationAreaOther.description:
Administration area other.
Where was the drug taken/injected.

DrugForm.description:
Drig form, i.e. tablet
Ref kodeverk 7448 at Volven: <URL>https://volven.no/produkt.asp?id=382962&catID=3&subID=8</URL>.

UnsureAreas.description:
Unsure about what?
Required if UnsureDrugFormOrStrength is Yes and Role is suspect or interacting

UnsureDescription.description:
Description of the unsureness
Required if UnsureDrugFormOrStrength is Yes and Role is suspect or interacting

SalesChannelDescription.description: Additional info about the sales channel

StartDate.description: Symptom start date. Supports only year or year and month as well

EndDate.description: Symptom end date. Supports only year or year and month as well

SideEffectsDelay.description: How long it took from the first use of the drug to side effects occured

UsageFrequency.description: How often do you use e-cigarettes

PurchaseLocationName.description: Name of the shop where the product was purchased

ImplantDate.description:
Implant date.
Year only or year and month are also accepted (2021-10-23 or 2021-10 or 2021)

ExplantDate.description:
Explant date
Year only or year and month are also accepted (2021-10-23 or 2021-10 or 2021)

ProductionDate.description:
Production date.
Year only or year and month are also accepted

ExpirationDate.description:
Equipment expiration date.
Year only or year and month are also accepted

SendToHtil.description: If true, send report to UKOM. Default true

SendToUkom.description: If true, send report to HTIL. Default true

DTO.V10.ExternalApi.SeriousIncidentAddit.description: Additional info. Relevent to Helsenorge reports only

Id.description: Generert ID i En Vei Inn sin database

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.Response.BaseRespons.description: Generell baseklasse for respons fra APIet. Inneholder statuskode og feilmelding

ExceptionType.description: Hva slags type feil det gjelder

CorrelationId.description: KorrelasjonsId fra kallet som feilen oppsto i

InnerException.description: Fylles bare ut i testmiljø - indre feilmelding

Brukernavn.description: Navn på bruker som kalte funksjonen feilen oppsto i

Id.description: Generert ID i En Vei Inn sin database

EksterntSaksSystem.description: Eksternt system, for eksempel navn på avvikssystem

EksternSaksid.description: Id i eksternt system, for eksempel AVVIK123

MeldingsId.description: MeldingsId på meldingen. Oppgitt ved innsending.

Mottakere.description: Liste med navn på meldeordninger som mottar meldingen

Referansenummer.description: Menneskelig leselig referansenummer, for eksempel XYZ12

MeldersEpost.description: Dersom e-postadresse ble oppgitt, e-postadresse varsling blir sendt til.

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.Response.KvitteringsMe.description: Svarmelding uavhengig av om kall til controlleren gikk bra eller ikke. Dersom feil oppstår legges det i Feil-feltet.

ReportRef.description: Reference to the report that this dialog is associated with, on the format [Uxxxx] or [Vxxxx]

ReportArea.description: Report area id. Assigned by NHN when the API is activated.

Email.description:
Dialog creator's email address.
Required for web frontend only.

DialogRef.description: Dialog reference for this message, on the format [Dxxxx]

MessageText.description: Message text. HTML formatting may be used if the receiving system supports it. Melde.no does.

SenderName.description:
Sender name. For instance case manager name.
If not specified, the name of the client is used.

NotifyRecipient.description:
Flag to control receiver notification.
If false, the receiver will not receive a notification (often email) about the new message.
If true, the receiver is notified.
Default is true.

DialogRef.description: Referansenummer til generert dialog i En Vei Inn sin database

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.V10.Dialog.Response.Ge.description: Respons som inneholder en liste med uleste meldinger

ReceivedTime.description:
Tidspunkt når meldingen ble mottatt av Melde. ISO datoformat i UTC.
Eksempel. '2022-07-13T05:20:01.908Z'

ReportRef.description: Referanse til den uønskede hendelsen denne dialogmeldingen tilhører, på formatet [Uxxxx] eller [Vxxxx]

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.V10.Enums.EquipmentLoc.description: Where is the equipment located at the time of reporting

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.V10.Enums.Gender.description:
Pasientens kjønn (OID=3101)
Se kodeverk 3101 på volven: <URL>https://volven.no/produkt.asp?id=382591&catID=3&subID=8</URL>.

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.V10.Enums.Kjøpssted.description: Mulige valg for hvor legemiddelet ble kjøpt

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.V10.Enums.LegemiddelBi.description: Hva gjorde bruker når bivirkning oppstod

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.V10.Enums.ReactionDela.description: How long time after exposure did the reaction show

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.V10.Enums.SideEffectOu.description:
Side effect outcome
Ref kodeverk 7469 at volven: <URL>https://volven.no/produkt.asp?id=382526&catID=3&subID=8</URL>.

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.V10.Enums.SideEffectSe.description:
Bivirkningens alvorlighet
Se kodeverk 7468 på volven: <URL>https://volven.no/produkt.asp?id=382525&catID=3&subID=8</URL>.

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.V10.Enums.Tilstand.description: Tilstand til område før et produkt ble brukt

Content.description:
Attachment content.
Base64 encoded. May be prefixed by for instance 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'

OrgNumber.description:
Organization number.
Required if Name is empty

Name.description:
Organization name.
Required if OrgNumber is empty

Hdir.EnVeiInn.DTO.V10.ExternalAPI.Radiat.description: Radiation report part. Currently empty, but may be expanded in the future

Bearer.description: Put **_ONLY_** your JWT Bearer token on textbox below!

tags.name: Ping
tags.description: Tilbyr tjenester som kan brukes i forbindelse med testing

tags.name: AdverseIncident
tags.description: Adverse incident reporting API version 2 accepts DPoP access tokens only

tags.name: Dialog
tags.description: Dialog API version 2 accepts standard DPoP access tokens only
